text: Moses Hamungole (1 May 1967 - 13 January 2021) was a Zambian Roman Catholic bishop. Hamungole was born in Lusaka, Zambia. He became a priest in 1994. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Monze, Zambia from 2014 until his death in 2021. Hamungole died on 13 January 2021 in Lusaka from COVID-19, aged 53.Diocese of Monze ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Zambian people Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Zambia
title: Moses Hamungole
